description:
The One Eau De Parfum - A Timeless Luxury Fragrance

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce & Gabbana The One Eau De Parfum in a generous 150ml bottle. This bestselling fragrance embodies sophisticated elegance and timeless appeal that has made it a signature scent for discerning individuals worldwide. âœ¨

The Essence of The One

The One is an oriental floral masterpiece that captures the essence of luxury and sensuality. Created by legendary perfumer Olivier Polge, this exquisite fragrance combines warm amber notes with fresh citrus and delicate florals, creating a harmonious symphony that lingers beautifully on the skin. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 150ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau De Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Dolce & Gabbana

Captivating Fragrance Notes

Discover the complex composition of The One Eau De Parfum that develops beautifully throughout the day: ðŸ’«

Note Type Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Mandarin, Lychee, Peach
Heart Notes Madonna Lily, Jasmine, Lily of the Valley, Plum
Base Notes Vanilla, Amber, Musk, Vetiver

Key Features of The One Eau De Parfum

  • Long-lasting oriental floral fragrance ðŸ”¥
  • Luxurious 150ml size for extended enjoyment
  • Sophisticated amber-based composition
  • Elegant bottle design that enhances any vanity
  • Perfect for special occasions and everyday luxury
  • Signature Dolce & Gabbana craftsmanship

The Legacy of The One

Launched in 2006, The One has established itself as one of Dolce & Gabbana's most iconic fragrances. Designed for the woman who is "The One" - unique, magnetic, and unforgettable - this perfume celebrates femininity and confidence. The brand's commitment to luxury and quality is evident in every aspect of this timeless fragrance that continues to captivate new generations of fragrance enthusiasts. ðŸ’Ž

Frequently Asked Question

What makes The One Eau De Parfum different from other Dolce & Gabbana fragrances?

The One stands apart with its perfect balance of oriental warmth and floral femininity. Unlike other D&G fragrances, it features a distinctive amber-vanilla base that creates exceptional longevity and sillage. The addition of Madonna lily gives it a unique creamy quality that's instantly recognizable and has made it a luxury fragrance icon for over a decade. The 150ml size offers exceptional value for devoted fans of this remarkable scent. ðŸŒ¿
